definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The making of such a mold or cast, as with plaster of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 此类模型或模子的制作同巴黎石膏制法。

sentences.english: To shape molten metal by pouring into a mold to produce an ingot or a continuously cast slab.
sentences.chinese: 将熔融的金属倒进模子里成型，以制成锭铁或扁钢锭。

sentences.english: It makes it more interesting than the cookie-cutter physiques seen in some books.
sentences.chinese: 这个远远比书中看到的一个模子压出来的身体有趣。

sentences.english: Newspaper Die Welt was also offered shortly before arriving in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 报纸模子鞭痕不久之前并且被提供了到达在巴黎。

sentences.english: " It is clear, "Ci Yuan" is also beautiful as an aesthetic mold will be treated.
sentences.chinese: 很显然，《辞源》也是将锦绣作为审美模子看待的。

sentences.english: To be the statue of Chastisement cast in one piece in the mould of the law, and.
sentences.chinese: 是法律模子中浇铸出来的一整个主惩罚的铜像。

sentences.english: A huge mold was modified to build the monument.
sentences.chinese: 一个巨大的模子被改造来建造他的纪念碑。

sentences.english: Injection molded appearance components should be molded-in color and may be painted.
sentences.chinese: 注射塑造外表组件应该是模子在的颜色和可能被画。

sentences.english: With the mows (molds) an unlimited number of machines can be built with locally purchased metal pounds (parts).
sentences.chinese: 利用模子在当地采购金属部件可以制造更多的机器。

sentences.english: Knock the mould against the table to dislodge the mooncake.
sentences.chinese: 把模子往桌上敲，来移动月饼。

sentences.english: When the gold was heated and melted, they poured it into a mould to form a gold bar.
sentences.chinese: 当金子加热融化后，他们把金水倒进模子，铸成金条。

sentences.english: With chromate treated die cast treatment .
sentences.chinese: 与铬酸盐对待了模子塑像治疗。

sentences.english: She lets them sit for a day or two in a warm place so the soap can dry and harden.
sentences.chinese: 然后会将模子放置于温热的地方以便肥皂变干变硬。

sentences.english: Line up drum moulds in a semi circle at one end of the bath.
sentences.chinese: 把数个圆筒模子沿锌锅的一端排成一个半圆形。

sentences.english: As its root structure grows it hardens to fill the mold.
sentences.chinese: 待其根部结构成长后，表面变硬而填满模子。

sentences.english: The moulds should be completely coated on the inside in butter and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 模子的内侧必须完全粘上黄油和糖。
